channel.title: Shard Revolution [317]
channel.description: Hey there. I've been building my server off Shard revolution for a little while now, but I need some help (I know, I suck) A few things I want to be done... I can't seem to make myself owner/admin... Kind of odd really... I would like for mods/admins to be able to spawn items, this would be used for donations and stuff. I want to make salve amulets a rather custom item... So that they never hit 0s... Also a few other things. If anyone can help please let me know, :D

item.title: Shard Revolution [317]
item.dc:creator: @TheNinjah TheNinjah
item.description:
@TheNinjah wrote:

Hey there.
I’ve been building my server off Shard revolution for a little while now, but I need some help (I know, I suck)
A few things I want to be done…
I can’t seem to make myself owner/admin… Kind of odd really…
I would like for mods/admins to be able to spawn items, this would be used for donations and stuff.
I want to make salve amulets a rather custom item… So that they never hit 0s…
Also a few other things.
If anyone can help please let me know,

Read full topic
